moon_info: Lua Nova: Quando a lua nÃ£o Ã© visÃ­vel porque estÃ¡ localizada entre a Terra e o Sol. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: 0%.
moon_info_2: Crescente: Quando uma pequena fraÃ§Ã£o da lua se torna visÃ­vel, aumentando a cada noite apÃ³s a lua nova. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: 1%â€“49%.
moon_info_3: Quarto Crescente: Quando metade da face da lua estÃ¡ iluminada, ocorrendo aproximadamente uma semana apÃ³s a lua nova. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: ~50%.
moon_info_4: Gibosa Crescente: Quando mais da metade da lua estÃ¡ iluminada, antecedendo a lua cheia. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: 51%â€“99%.
moon_info_5: Lua Cheia: Quando toda a face da lua estÃ¡ iluminada pelo Sol, aparecendo como um cÃ­rculo completo. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: 100%.
moon_info_6: Gibosa Minguante: Quando a lua comeÃ§a a diminuir apÃ³s a lua cheia, mas mais da metade dela permanece iluminada. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: 99%â€“51%.
moon_info_7: Quarto Minguante: Quando metade da face da lua estÃ¡ iluminada novamente, ocorrendo aproximadamente uma semana apÃ³s a lua cheia. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: ~50%.
moon_info_8: Minguante: Quando apenas uma pequena fraÃ§Ã£o da lua permanece visÃ­vel antes da lua nova. IluminaÃ§Ã£o: 49%â€“1%.
moon_info_9: IluminaÃ§Ã£o: A porcentagem da superfÃ­cie da lua que estÃ¡ iluminada pelo Sol, que varia dependendo da fase da lua.

activity_suggestions_temp_1: ğŸ¥¶ Extreme cold: In temperatures below -40Â°C (-40Â°F), you need high-insulation gear. Wear a heavy-duty down parka with windproof outer layers, a balaclava, thermal base layers, thick wool socks, insulated boots, and a face mask. All exposed skin must be covered to avoid frostbite.
activity_suggestions_temp_2: ğŸ¥¶ Extreme cold: Layer with thermal base layers (top and bottom), a down or synthetic coat, thick wool socks, insulated boots, and a wool hat. Make sure to wear insulated gloves and a scarf to cover exposed skin.
activity_suggestions_temp_3: ğŸ¥¶ Very cold: A heavy-duty winter jacket is necessary. Wear thermal leggings, thick wool socks, and insulated boots. Insulated gloves and a wool hat will keep you warm. Layering is key in these frigid temperatures.
activity_suggestions_temp_4: ğŸ§¥ Very cold: Layer with a heavy winter coat, sweater, and long underwear. Thermal gloves, insulated boots, and a scarf are essential. A wool hat or beanie will provide extra warmth for your head.
activity_suggestions_temp_5: ğŸ§¥ Cold weather: Wear a thick winter coat or puffer jacket with a sweater underneath. Insulated gloves, wool socks, a scarf, and a hat are necessary for comfort in these temperatures.
activity_suggestions_temp_6: ğŸ§¥ Cold weather: A heavy jacket or coat is recommended. Pair with thermal gloves, a wool scarf, and thick socks. Opt for boots to keep your feet warm and dry.
activity_suggestions_temp_7: ğŸ§¥ Cool weather: Layer with a warm jacket or puffer coat. Consider wearing thermal socks and boots, as well as gloves for extra protection from the chill. A scarf will also add warmth around your neck.
activity_suggestions_temp_8: ğŸ§³ Mild weather: A light jacket or sweater should suffice. Pair with jeans or trousers, and consider a hat to protect against mild wind or sun exposure.
activity_suggestions_temp_9: ğŸ§³ Mild weather: Dress in layers with a light jacket or sweater. You can wear long sleeves, but consider switching to short sleeves if it feels warm. A scarf can help if the wind picks up.
activity_suggestions_temp_10: â˜€ï¸ Warm weather: Opt for breathable fabrics like cotton or linen. A short-sleeve shirt, shorts, or a skirt will keep you comfortable. Donâ€™t forget sunglasses and sunscreen to protect against UV rays.
activity_suggestions_temp_11: â˜€ï¸ Hot weather: Wear lightweight, moisture-wicking clothing like cotton or linen. A wide-brimmed hat and sunglasses are essential to shield from the sun. Stay hydrated and wear sunscreen, especially if youâ€™ll be outside for long periods.
activity_suggestions_temp_12: â˜€ï¸ Hot weather: Dress in lightweight, breathable clothing. Lightweight, loose-fitting shirts and shorts or skirts will help you stay cool. Donâ€™t forget to hydrate regularly and apply sunscreen to avoid sunburn.
activity_suggestions_temp_13: â˜€ï¸ Extremely hot: Wear loose-fitting, moisture-wicking fabrics to stay cool. Avoid dark colors as they absorb heat. A wide-brimmed hat, sunglasses, and plenty of sunscreen are crucial. Stay in shaded areas as much as possible and drink water constantly.
activity_suggestions_humidity_1: ğŸ’¦ High humidity: Wear moisture-wicking clothes and carry a towel to stay dry.
activity_suggestions_humidity_2: ğŸ’§ Low humidity: Use a hydrating moisturizer to avoid dry skin.

activity_suggestions_airQualityDescripti: ğŸ‘ Air quality is good today. It\'s safe to be outdoors and breathe easy. ğŸŒ¿ Perfect day for a walk in the park, jogging, or other outdoor activities!
ğŸ‘Œ The air is fresh, so it\'s a great time to enjoy outdoor activities like hiking or biking. Stay active and enjoy the clear skies!
â˜€ï¸ With great air quality, it\'s the perfect time to engage in outdoor sports or simply relax outside. Go for a jog or picnic!

ğŸ‘Œ Air quality is moderate. It\'s okay for most people, but sensitive individuals (children, elderly, or those with respiratory conditions) might want to limit prolonged outdoor exposure. ğŸŒ³ Consider taking it easy if you have allergies or asthma.
ğŸŒ¿ Air quality is acceptable for most people, but be cautious if you have respiratory issues. Opt for light outdoor activities like walking or stretching.
ğŸŒ¥ï¸ It\'s a good day for outdoor activities if you\'re generally healthy. However, individuals with asthma or other respiratory concerns should limit time outdoors.

âš ï¸ Air quality is unhealthy for sensitive groups. Those with respiratory or heart conditions should avoid strenuous outdoor activities. ğŸ  If possible, stay indoors or wear a mask if you\'re heading outside.
ğŸš¶ Sensitive individuals should reduce outdoor exposure. It might be best to stay indoors or use a mask if you need to go outside. Consider limiting outdoor exercise.
ğŸ’¨ If you have a pre-existing health condition, avoid outdoor activities and stay indoors to minimize exposure. Make sure to wear a mask if you must go outside.

ğŸš· Air quality is unhealthy. Limit outdoor exposure as much as possible. ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ For outdoor workers or athletes, consider rescheduling activities or using an N95 mask. ğŸš« Avoid physical activities outdoors, especially for children and people with health concerns.
